name: Summoning Art of Alhazred
text: Search your main deck for a Demon resonator, reveal it and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your main deck. If your J/ruler is "Ebony Prophet" or "Abdul Alhazred, the Harbringer of Despair", you may pay BB less to play cards with the same name as the card you searched until end of turn.
set: The Castle of Heaven and the Two Towers
